name: Burbogoo (Prototype)
description:
You play a slime that begins to make an excursion to another island, you settled quietly to spend a good holiday and then came the exploration of the island, and that is how the adventure begins! 

Using you Slime capacity, you can made a path to exit, flattened, retract, jump then dash forward, or absorbed the objects and then use them at your way!
